titles.title: To enact certain laws relating to public contracts as title 41, United States Code, "Public Contracts".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 109-663.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 230.

bill.summary: 9/15/2006--Reported to House without amendment. Enacts title 41 of the United States Code into positive law to be entitled "Public Contracts." Makes technical and conforming amendments.
